linux: if [ ! -d "$HOME/.oh-my-zsh" ]; then RUNZSH=no CHSH=no sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh/master/tools/install.sh)"; fi
if ! grep -q 'exec zsh' ~/.bashrc; then echo '' >> ~/.bashrc; echo '# Auto-start zsh' >> ~/.bashrc; echo 'exec zsh' >> ~/.bashrc; fi
echo 'Done! New terminals will automatically start zsh.'
echo 'To start zsh in this terminal now, run:'
echo 'Or just open a new terminal.'
